response.job_title: MBA Candidate | Technology | Supply Chain | Senior Supervisor
response.skills: Written Communication, Product Strategies, Regulatory Requirements, Material Selection, Raw Materials, Strategic Sourcing, Material Requirements Planning (MRP), Communication, Change Management, Strategy, Project Management, Lean Manufacturing, Microsoft Office, Engineering, Planificación de la demanda, Planificación estratégica, Product Development, Business Strategy, Microsoft Excel, Team Leadership

company.name: Questrom School of Business, Boston University

profile_positions.company: Questrom School of Business, Boston University
profile_positions.title: MBA Candidate

profile_positions.description:
Managed team of 10 across Canada and LatAm (12+ countries). Team ensured supply planning of 50,000 SKUs, guaranteeing permanent coordination with requirements of marketing and commercial divisions.
• Designed and executed functional restructuring, by the realignment of roles and responsibilities. 15 processes impacted, 40+ people involved, generating a 10% service level increase.
• Developed and accomplished initiatives to eliminate backorders and maintain inventory levels, enhancing the area's KPIs by 15%-20%.
profile_positions.title: Sr Supply Chain Planning Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
Liaised with local and global marketing, commercial, and supply chain teams to identify constraints of the demand forecast and drive solutions to mitigate such gaps.
• Accomplished a major operating restructuring of the area processes, reducing the number of employees required to perform the process by 50%. The restructuring involved centralizing the supply planning activities of 10 LATAM countries in one Shared Services Center.
• Led the implementation of an automated solution to reduce reporting time from 10 to 1 hour/week.
profile_positions.title: Supply Planner

profile_positions.description:
Advised sales planning for regional commercial and marketing teams and ensured product supply aligned with monthly forecast for the extended cluster of Colombia, Panama and Caribbean.
• Implemented a project to centralize planning process of 7 countries, achieving annual savings of $120K.
• Executed planning process for Colombia, Panama, and Caribbean. Forecast accuracy improved from 66% to 85% and generated $3M in working capital benefits by enhancing inventory levels.
profile_positions.title: Planning Specialist - Colombia, Panamá, Caribe

profile_positions.description:
Assured products supply met the monthly forecast.
• Facilitated the S&OP process, partnering with local supply chain team of 5 and regional planning team of 3.
• Spearheaded the demand and supply planning of raw materials and finished products, guaranteeing availability and reducing inventory levels by $1.5M.
profile_positions.title: Planning Specialist - Colombia

profile_positions.description:
Implemented growth strategies for product and service offers.
• Designed new services for current customers, generating additional $200K/year in revenue.
• Drove initiatives to improve working capital, securing $5M+ in WC reductions associated with inventory and additional revenue of $1M by leading efforts to reduce scrap.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Trainee
